segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookie jar, he doesn't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing something similar when I was a kid, and I ended up falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, but she looks worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but I also hope they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink still hasn't noticed them, but she might at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared for the boy, but I also find it exciting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies are in that jar, and if they're worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell him to be careful, but he wouldn't listen to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid he's going to regret climbing up there, but I also hope he gets the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
